content:
| Segment | Starting Position | Ending Position | What Moved Them |
|---------|-------------------|-----------------|-----------------|
| Suburban women (college+) | Lean R | Voted D | Abortion rights, candidate quality |
| Union households | Soft D | Solid D | Working-class biography, manufacturing message |
| Rural whites | Strong R | Strong R | Not persuadable this cycle - need earlier investment |
| Black voters (Detroit, Flint) | Soft D | Solid D | Turnout operation, AG record on Flint |
| Young voters (18-35) | Low turnout | High turnout | Abortion, housing costs, student debt |
| Seniors | Mixed | Lean D | Prescription drugs, Social Security protection |

---
